ItemType.name: Ares lightning cannon
ItemType.description: During the Syrtis War the lightning cannons of the Orthodoxy were devastating to the Earth Fleet.

ItemType.name: Ares launcher
ItemType.description: These launchers can fire both a standard micronuke or the heavier and deadlier Warhammer nuke.

ItemType.name: Ares lightning turret
ItemType.description: This omnidirectional turret fires rapid bursts of ion energy, but requires periods of rest.

ItemType.name: Ares micronuke cannon
ItemType.description: These cannons can launch a micronuke warhead at 60% of lightspeed.

ItemType.name: Hecates cannon
ItemType.description: The Hecates cannon is a fusion howitzer used by Ares destroyers.

ItemType.name: Ares positron cannon
ItemType.description: Ares engineers created this weapon after the Commonwealth developed defenses against their lightning cannon.

ItemType.name: Ares plasma archcannon
ItemType.description: The most powerful weapon in the Ares fleet. The plasma archcannon can destroy anything that's not protected by massive shields and armor.

ItemType.name: PM6 Slicer cannon
ItemType.description: A modified particle cannon firing crisscrossing beams.

ItemType.name: Centauri recoilless| Centauri recoilless cannons
ItemType.description: Centauri raiders use twin recoilless cannons, firing light rounds.

ItemType.name: CLAW cannon
ItemType.description: Centauri warlords create these weapons by linking together two DK10 Arbalest cannons. The CLAW cannon requires two device slots to install.

ItemType.name: heavy CLAW cannon
ItemType.description: The Centauri warlord's favorite weapon is a massive dual kinetic-cannon. The heavy CLAW cannon requires two device slots to install.

ItemType.name: NM900 external missile pod
ItemType.description: This external pod is loaded with thirty-six XM900 nuclear missiles and can be installed without the aid of a station.

Events.Reload: ; Reloads the pod with missiles (objSetItemCharges gSource gItem 36)

ItemType.name: Lamplighter archcannon
ItemType.description: Commissioned by Admiral Decker, this Commonwealth secret weapon is arguably the most powerful weapon created by humans.

ItemType.name: Project Lamplighter prototype
ItemType.description: This prototype is designed to test the antimatter blast chamber of the Project Lamplighter weapon.

ItemType.name: laser cannon
ItemType.description: A popular weapon for light freighters and fast gunships. This weapon is manufactured by the Earth Industries Conglomerate.

ItemType.name: AK505 Ballista cannon
ItemType.description: The largest kinetic mass driver created by NAMI, the Ballista cannon can pummel a medium-sized station.

ItemType.name: Dwarg xiphon cannon
ItemType.description: This blast weapon is mounted on a small swivelling platform, enabling it to fire in a 20 degree arc.

ItemType.name: Dwarg cnidocyst cannon
ItemType.description: Dwarg masters use this cannon to paralyze their targets.

ItemType.name: Dwarg behemoth cannon
ItemType.description: Dwarg behemoths use this thermonuclear cannon.

ItemType.name: Ferian plasma cannon
ItemType.description: Ferians have adapted their plasma torches for combat.

ItemType.name: Gaian demolition cannon
ItemType.description: Gaians use these cannons for their vast engineering projects. The technology to power the cannon is known only to the Gaians.

ItemType.name: blinder cannon
ItemType.description: A blinder cannon shoots out a thin stream of ionized particles that disrupts a ship's sensors.

ItemType.name: sunflare cannon
ItemType.description: Heliotropes developed this heavy ion particle cannon. Its blast is almost as destructive as a solar eruption.

ItemType.name: Quantumsphere disintegrator
ItemType.description: As the Iocrym abhor chaos, their weapons are designed to reduce their targets to plasma clouds of uniform density.

ItemType.name: Iocrym Avalanche cannon
ItemType.description: This weapon is used on Iocrym capital ships.

ItemType.name: Iocrym Fracture cannon
ItemType.description: This is a plasma weapon used by the Iocrym gunships.

ItemType.name: Iocrym repeller
ItemType.description: This is a short-range weapon used by Iocrym command ships to defend their perimeter.

ItemType.name: Luminous blaster
ItemType.attributes: energyWeapon, luminous, military, majorItem, notForSale, notStandard
ItemType.description: This ion blaster is used by Luminous for its drones.

ItemType.name: Ballista turret
ItemType.description: Outlaw engineers have mounted a Ballista cannon on an RK15 mount.

ItemType.name: mark I howitzer turret
ItemType.description: This is a mark I howitzer on an omnidirectional turret.

ItemType.name: Penitent cannon
ItemType.attributes: alien, energyWeapon, penitents, majorItem, notForSale, notStandard
ItemType.description: Very little is known about these exotic, dark-matter weapons. The Order of Penitence uses these weapons in their ships.

ItemType.name: kiloton cannon
ItemType.description: This heavy nuclear cannon requires kiloton cannon shells.

ItemType.name: Dvalin Ion9 cannon
ItemType.description: This is an experimental ion cannon created by Rasiermesser's chief scientist.

ItemType.name: positron lancer
ItemType.description: This Ringer weapon fires a steady stream of high-energy positrons.

ItemType.name: actinide waste cannon
ItemType.description: The actinide waste cannon is a dirty weapon that shoots out a cloud of radioactive debris.

ItemType.name: mining laser
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, EI, energyWeapon, essentialMiningEquipment, majorItem, miningEquipment, specialty
ItemType.description: This powerful laser is generally used for asteroid mining. Mining lasers are particularly effective on icy and primordial asteroids.

ItemType.name: magma cutter(s)
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, essentialMiningEquipment, majorItem, miningEquipment, NAMI, specialty
ItemType.description: 22nd century miners relied on magma cutters to carve up iron-rich asteroids. Magma cutters are particularly effective on metallic and icy asteroids.

ItemType.name: proton drill
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, EI, energyWeapon, essentialMiningEquipment, majorItem, miningEquipment, specialty
ItemType.description: This proton beam weapon is primarily used for mining. It is particularly effective on icy and primordial asteroids.

ItemType.name: plasma torch(es)
ItemType.attributes: commonwealth, essentialMiningEquipment, majorItem, miningEquipment, NAMI, specialty
ItemType.description: Plasma torches are used for large-scale asteroid mining. They are effective on icy and metallic asteroids.

ItemType.name: DM600 disposable missile rack
ItemType.description: This disposable weapon system is loaded with thirty-two KM100 missiles. The weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: laser cannon
ItemType.description: A popular weapon for light freighters and fast gunships. This weapon is manufactured by the Earth Industries Conglomerate.

ItemType.name: recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Recoilless cannons are slower than the ubiquitous laser cannon but pack a bigger punch.

ItemType.name: light recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This specialized version of the recoilless cannon shoots lighter projectiles but has a higher fire rate.

ItemType.name: Bolide laser blaster
ItemType.description: Soon after release, the Bolide was obsoleted by EI's turbolaser cannon, though some insist the Bolide is a better weapon for the price.

ItemType.name: DM1500 disposable missile rack
ItemType.description: The DM1500 is loaded with thirty-two KM500 tracking missiles. This weapon can be installed and uninstalled without the aid of a station.

ItemType.name: dual laser cannon
ItemType.description: Twin laser cannons manufactured by Earth Industries.

ItemType.name: fast-fire laser cannon
ItemType.description: The fast-fire laser cannon uses enhanced capacitors and has a fire rate almost double that of a standard laser.

ItemType.name: heavy recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the common recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: TK10 Trident cannon
ItemType.description: The TK10 Trident cannon is another in the popular series of NAMI kinetic weapons. The TK10 fires three small high-velocity projectiles.

ItemType.name: DK10 Arbalest cannon
ItemType.description: The Arbalest cannon is an automatic minigun that fires in bursts of four shells.

ItemType.name: laser cannon array
ItemType.description: The laser cannon array consists of three laser cannons joined in a forward spread pattern.

ItemType.name: Moskva 11 light turret
ItemType.description: This omnidirectional turret fires powerful high-explosive shells, but its range is very limited.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional laser cannon
ItemType.description: A single laser cannon with an automated targeting system.

ItemType.name: NAMI missile launcher
ItemType.description: This launcher is compatible with a full range of popular missiles including the KM100 Longbows and the XM900 Lucifers.

ItemType.name: AK15 Partisan cannon
ItemType.description: This recoilless kinetic cannon, manufactured by NAMI, is more powerful than the heavy recoilless cannon.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser SmartCannon
ItemType.description: Rasiermesser brought the SmartCannon to market despite opposition from law enforcement.

ItemType.name: dual recoilless cannon
ItemType.description: Twin recoilless cannons manufactured by NAMI.

ItemType.name: turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: One of the most popular designs by the Earth Industries Conglomerate, the turbolaser cannon is a cheap, powerful, and reliable weapon.

ItemType.name: AK505 Ballista cannon
ItemType.description: The largest kinetic mass driver created by NAMI, the Ballista cannon can pummel a medium-sized station.

ItemType.name: Flenser relativistic cannon
ItemType.description: The Flenser relativistic cannon fires small masses at nearly the speed of light.

ItemType.name: MAG launcher
ItemType.description: The MAG launcher is a flexible and sophisticated grenade launcher that is compatible with a large range of MAG munitions.

ItemType.name: particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target.

ItemType.name: PK25 Morning Star cannon
ItemType.description: NAMI's Morning Star cannon shoots a high-velocity cloud of dense particles that can severely damage light to medium armor.

ItemType.name: Moskva 21 dual cannon
ItemType.description: This dual cannon shoots high-explosive shells in a scattered pattern.

ItemType.name: :an RK15 Partisan turret
ItemType.description: An omnidirectional version of the Partisan cannon.

ItemType.name: slam cannon
ItemType.description: The slam cannon fires high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: dual turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: Turbolasers in a twin configuration have became popular with pirates and marauders.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional turbolaser cannon
ItemType.description: A single turbolaser mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: Akan 30 cannon
ItemType.description: The Akan 30 is a powerful cannon designed by the Rasiermesser Corporation.

ItemType.name: dual Flenser cannon
ItemType.description: The ultimate kinetic weapon, 60% more powerful than the AK505 Ballista.

ItemType.name: EMP cannon
ItemType.description: This cannon shoots out a stream of ionized particles that disrupts the control systems on most starships.

ItemType.name: lancer cannon
ItemType.description: The lancer cannon is a high-powered beam weapon.

ItemType.name: Makayev launcher
ItemType.description: The Makayev consists of fast launch tubes compatible with the Strelka series of light missiles.

ItemType.name: mark I howitzer
ItemType.description: The mark I howitzer fires heavy, high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: dual particle beam weapon
ItemType.description: A modified linear accelerator fires energetic particles at its target.

ItemType.name: particle beam turret
ItemType.description: A single particle beam weapon mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: Shuriken neutron blaster
ItemType.description: The fastest weapon in its price range, this Bushido Corp design uses a double chamber to fire high-energy neutrons.

ItemType.name: Moskva 33 repeater
ItemType.description: One of the most successful Makayev designs, the Moskva repeater fires a cluster of high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: heavy slam cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier and more powerful version of the slam cannon.

ItemType.name: dual x-ray laser cannon
ItemType.description: A nuclear-powered laser source is the core of this weapon system.

ItemType.name: Akan 600 turret
ItemType.description: This weapons places an Akan 30 cannon on a computer-controlled, omnidirectional turret.

ItemType.name: Dragonfly missile system
ItemType.description: This cheap cartridge missile launcher fires three tracking micro-missiles.

ItemType.name: mark III howitzer
ItemType.description: This is an improved version of the mark I howitzer.

ItemType.name: SAR/10 cannon
ItemType.description: The SAR/10 was developed in the 2360s as an alternative to the TeV 9.

ItemType.name: TeV 9 blaster
ItemType.description: This versatile weapon, developed by Earth Industries, was used in early Centurion heavy gunship designs.

ItemType.name: Hanzo blaster
ItemType.attributes: bushido, commonwealth, energyWeapon, majorItem, military, specialty
ItemType.description: The top-of-the-line weapon manufactured by the Bushido corporation. This weapon consists of dual particle weapons linked by a high-speed control system.

ItemType.name: light ion blaster
ItemType.description: EI consistently denies rumors that it used stolen Ares schematics to develop this line of ion weapons.

ItemType.name: Katana star cannon
ItemType.attributes: bushido, commonwealth, energyWeapon, majorItem, military, specialty
ItemType.description: The star cannon fires a stream of high-energy ions that continue to cause damage as they punch through armor.

ItemType.name: mark V howitzer
ItemType.description: The mark V howitzer fires a light thermonuclear shell.

ItemType.name: NAMI mine launcher
ItemType.description: The NAMI mine launcher is used by the Commonwealth Fleet to defend colonies in Ares space.

ItemType.name: dual TeV 9 blaster
ItemType.description: Two TeV 9 blasters linked by a common fire control.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional TeV 9 blaster
ItemType.description: A single TeV 9 blaster mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: dual SAR/10 cannon
ItemType.description: After the Ares onslaught of 2372, the Fleet upgraded its Centurion gunships to this thermonuclear cannon.

ItemType.name: SAR/40 cannon
ItemType.description: This is a heavier version of the SAR/10 thermonuclear cannon.

ItemType.name: thermo cannon
ItemType.description: Produced in great numbers in the Syrtis War, the cannon is now common throughout the Outer Realm.

ItemType.name: tritium cannon
ItemType.description: The tritium shells fired by this cannon detonate on contact in a thermonuclear explosion.

ItemType.name: Fusionfire howitzer
ItemType.description: This venerable weapon design is still common at the edge of Human Space.

ItemType.name: ion blaster
ItemType.description: The ion blaster fires a bolt of ionized particles.

ItemType.name: ion flame cannon
ItemType.description: The ion flame cannon fires multiple ion blasts in an arc in front of the ship.

ItemType.name: Rasiermesser launcher
ItemType.description: After the success of the SmartCannon, the Rasiermesser corporation developed a line of missiles for the military.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional thermo cannon
ItemType.description: This is a modified thermo cannon mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: TM7 multitarget cannon
ItemType.description: Taikon's TM7 cannon launches warheads that split into three independent missiles.

ItemType.name: heavy ion blaster
ItemType.description: This is a more powerful version of the ion blaster.

ItemType.name: NAMI heavy launcher
ItemType.description: The NAMI heavy launcher is designed for the capital ships of the Commonwealth Fleet.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional ion blaster
ItemType.description: Similar in design to the ion blaster, but mounted on an automated turret.

ItemType.name: SAR/200 advanced cannon
ItemType.description: The recently introduced SAR/200 cannon is designed to defend carriers against Ares gunships.

ItemType.name: advanced tritium cannon
ItemType.description: This improved version can fire at more than triple the rate of the tritium cannon. Unfortunately, the cannon overheats quickly if fired continuously.

ItemType.name: IM90 multitarget blaster
ItemType.description: Taikon's IM90 blaster mounts three independently targeted gun barrels, each firing a blast of ion energy.

ItemType.name: plasma cannon
ItemType.description: This weapon emits a powerful plasma burst that can incinerate an unprotected ship.

ItemType.name: Qianlong archcannon
ItemType.description: The pinnacle of Sung Slaver technology, the Qianlong archcannon fires antimatter shells. The archcannon recharges with longzhu spheres.

Events.OnAIUpdate: (if (and (leq (itmGetCharges gItem) 256) (objGetItems gSource "u +LongzhuSphere;")) (block Nil (objFireItemEvent gSource gItem 'Recharge { charges:256 }) (objRemoveItem gSource (itmCreate &itLongzhuSphere; 1)) ) )
Events.Recharge: ; aCharges = amount to recharge ; Returns the amount recharged (block ( (newCharges (@ gData 'charges)) (rechargeNeeded (min newCharges (subtract 9999 (itmGetCharges gItem)))) ) (if (gr rechargeNeeded 0) (shpRechargeItem gSource gItem rechargeNeeded) ) rechargeNeeded )

ItemType.name: Nandao bolt cannon
ItemType.description: The Nandao bolt cannon fires a sublight pulse of heavy ions.

ItemType.name: Kytryn blaster
ItemType.description: Kytryn blasters were created by the Teratons based on research on Iocrym technology.

ItemType.name: Kytryn launcher
ItemType.description: This Teraton weapon launches a Kytryn plasma pod warhead, which blossoms into a shell of plasma energy.

ItemType.name: dual mark III howitzer
ItemType.attributes: cannotOrder, commonwealth, howitzer, majorItem, makayev, tinkers
ItemType.description: The Tinkers Guild has developed a technique for combining two mark III howitzers.

ItemType.name: omnidirectional x-ray laser
ItemType.attributes: bushido, cannotOrder, commonwealth, energyWeapon, majorItem, tinkers
ItemType.description: The Tinkers Guild designed this nuclear-powered laser mounted on an omnidirectional turret.

ItemType.name: Urak mass driver
ItemType.description: The Urak mass driver is a short-range dual kinetic cannon that shoots heavy metal slugs.

ItemType.name: advanced Urak mass driver
ItemType.description: The advanced version of the Urak mass driver fires high-explosive shells.

ItemType.name: Urak howitzer
ItemType.description: Urak howitzers fire high-explosive shells that explode on proximity to their target.

ItemType.name: ion disruptor
ItemType.description: The ion disruptor's beam can penetrate a ship's hull and ionize the delicate mechanisms of weapons and other devices.

ItemType.name: Xenophobe ion lancer
ItemType.description: The Xenophobes developed this powerful ion weapon for their Worldships.
